name: Red Kane Redemption
description:
Controls. 

Arrow keys , space to fire or joystick. 

This was done for nostalgia reasons and  is the first level from the original Mastertronic 1986 game Kane.

 I may add additional levels in the near future. One thing I am struggling with is extracting the original graphics(been tracing them in photoshop) , if anyone can help in this regard, feel free to drop us a message.
